text: Winter Camp 2008 Mock Olympiad Monday, January 7, 2008 1. Find all triples of positive integers x, y, z satisfying 1 + 2x3y = z2. 2. For positive real numbers a, b, c such that abc ≤ 1, prove that a b + b c + c a ≥ a + b + c. 3. In acute triangle ABC, ∠A < 45◦. Point D lies in the interior of triangle ABC such that BD = CD and ∠BDC = 4∠A. Point E is the reﬂection of C across line AB, and point F is the reﬂection of B across line AC. Prove that AD ⊥ EF . 4. Let m, n be two positive integers with m ≥ n. Prove that n∑ k=0(−1) k(m − k n )(n k ) = 1.
